```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
v <- c(2, 5.5, 6, 9)
t <- c(8, 2.5, 14, 9)

v; t
```

IsNA Funtion

```{r}
v; is.na(v)
v2<-c(1,2,NA); is.na(v2)
```

Greater than
```{r}
v;t; print(v>t)
```


Smaller than
```{r}
v;t; print(v<t)
```

Comparison
```{r}
v;t; print(v==t)
```

Different
```{r}
v;t; print(v!=t)
```

Logical
```{r}
v1 <- c(3,1,T,0,10,3,3,32,3)
t2 <- c(F,1,F,23,31,21,44,21,F)

v1; t2
```

AND

```{r}
v1;t2; print(v1&t2)
```

OR
```{r}
v1;t2; print(v1|t2)
```

NOT
```{r}
v <- c(3,0,TRUE,2,0,1,1,2,1,0)

v; print(!v)
```

%in% Operator
```{r}
vec0 <- c(1:10,15:25)

evaluation1<- 20%in%vec0
vec0;evaluation1

evaluation1<- 30%in%vec0
vec0;evaluation1
```

Doble &&. Just compare the first element
```{r}
v1 <- c(3,1,T,0,10,3,3,32,3)
t2 <- c(F,1,F,23,31,21,44,21,F)

v1;t2; print(v1&&t2)
```

Doble ||
```{r}
v1;t2; print(v1||t2)
```

Help operators
```{r}
?"[["
```
